label: 安主
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Middle-level officer of a noble family's administrative headquarters (mandokoro); often involved with preparing documents or recording decisions. Performed such duties for the Kamakura Bakufu's mandokoro. Also, an administrative officer within a shōen.　[政所、荘園]
